transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Ji bataiye, mai bataiye. Hello.
Customer: Singh ki baat kar rahe hain Agra UP se?
Executive: Mai bol raha hu.
Customer: Sir aapki na IndiaMART se ek not satisfied ka mail aaya tha. Aapne sir service ke regarding not satisfied mark kara tha.
Customer: Kab, kab, kab?
Executive: Sir abhi recent aapki baat hui hai Ujjwal ji ke sath, aapka jo account dekhte hain. Unke sath aapki baat chit hui thi sir aapke renewal ke regarding hui thi. After sir aapne jo bhi charges the wo discuss karke not satisfied mark kar diya tha unki baat chit ko. Jaan sakti hu sir kya issue aaya tha?
Customer: Nahi maine dekho maine unse ye bola tha ki aap mujhe baar baar phone kar rahe the wo hai na. Uske baad maine bola tha ki mujhe ye bata dijiye ki maximizer maximizer se service hai wo alag plus kitne milenge. Aur service se aap utne milenge. Unhone wo mujhe, main uski aap service ki baat kar raha hu wo mujhse baat kar rahe hain. TrustSeal wale ki hai na. Ye le lo fir convert karaye na ye le lo. Maine ki mujhe isse jo mai puch raha hu mujhe wo jawab dijiye aap. Ha. 
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Fir ghuma ghuma fira karke fir se wahi fir se wahi tha do mahine baad le lena teen mahine baad le lena fir maine. Maine bhai mujhe abhi ek baat bata do mujhe dono ke plans bata do. Jo mujhe achcha lagega mai wo le dunga. Hai na? Ji. To fir uske baad maine usko not satisfied kar diya unki email aayi maine usko baat hi kar di.
Executive: Achcha sir. Singh sir kya tha na jaise unse discussion hua ki aapne unko not satisfied mark kiya. To aisa kya baat hua ki unhone not satisfied de diya. To wo bol rahe the ki matlab sir jo hai unke pass fund jo tha itna nahi tha limited tha jispe website jo services thi wo unko jyada costly padti. To unhone aapko aapka jo renewal hai TrustSeal catalog me kiya kyuki apni current TrustSeal. Simple sa jhoot bol raha hai. Simple sa jhoot bol raha hai. Aapke sath top service ko top service ko abhi at a time le sakta hu mai. Aapke sath top service ko 5 lakh 6 lakh wala keval at a time le sakta hu mai abhi. Achcha sir. Koi to koi wo nahi hai issue nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai Singh sir koi dikkat nahi hai. If aapko jo hai apna. Ha ha. Aisa hota hai ki aap ho ya mai hu. Hai na? Ji. Koi bhi market me jab rehta hai market me rehta hai to har koi insan chahta hai ki kam se kam paisa kharch ho achchi service mile hai na. To bargaining bargaining bargaining mai to chota sa aadmi hu. Ji. Aditya Birla wale sare bargaining karte hain. Thik hai Reliance wale bargaining karte hain. Hero wale wo sare log karte hain to mai to chota sa aadmi hu.
Executive: Right to right hota hai sir ki wo humse discounts mange. Hamare pass jo best hoga hum kara ke denge. Ye to sir totally aapki baat agreed hai. Ki aapka sir right hai ki aap humse discount mango. Kyuki sir sari companies mangti hain. Meri last time Vivek ji se aur aapse hi baat hui thi aur ek Sunil se pata nahi kaun kaun se baat hui thi. To kam se kam mere 15 din discussion chala tha hum logo ka. Last to last humne bola ab unhone bola ki sir isse jyada ho nahi payega lo ya na lo. Mujhe kuch thodi virus chalani thi ki theek hai sir aap karo. Hai na? To wahi cheez hoti hai na. To ye to ye to customer ka adhikar hota hai na. 
Executive: Bilkul wahi wahi mai keh rahi hu aapka right hai wo totally. Ki aap matlab us time pe jitna ho sakega sir hum batayenge. At last at last jo hota hai ki price jab hum ekdam ek limit pe aa jate hain jispe minimum me work order generate hoga hum uspe wo amount set kar sakte hain. Hum bata dete hain ki iske baad kuch nahi ho sakta sir.
Customer: Ha wahi mai kehna chah raha hu aapse.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai sir mai unse ek baar baat kar lungi Ujjwal ji se iske regarding. Agar aapne sir unko baat chit pe not satisfied mark kar diya. Nahi agar agar agar aapki agar aapki na recorded hoti ho aap ek baar aap usko recording sun lijiye aap. Audit audit kar lijiye ek baar sun lijiye.
Customer: Thik hai audit bhi kar lungi. Sure sure sir. Ab bataiye Singh sir mai aapko website ka proposal bheju renewal ke liye aapke?
Customer: Mujhe mujhe aap dono last to last price bata dijiye. Ki maximizer ka kitna price hai ya mujhe one year ka ye mujhe kitne me milega one year ka last to last price bata dijiye mujhe.
Executive: Bilkul last bataungi sir aapko. Isse isse kam ho nahi payega any process kam ho nahi payega.
Executive: Ek ek second sir aapka dekho jo TrustSeal hai sir. Aap mujhe bata dijiye isme TrustSeal kar dunga thoda sa kar dijiye ho jayega.
Executive: Thik hai mai aapko WhatsApp kar dungi sir koi dikkat.
Customer: Ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Marked 'not satisfied' due to pricing issues.

- Wants last price for maximizer and one-year plan.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss the issue with Ujjwal.

- Executive agreed customer has right to bargain.

- Executive will WhatsApp the final prices.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- not satisfied, renewal, pricing, trustseal, discount
